SEARCH
Package Photos71.src.model.data

Class Persistence

java.lang.Object
Photos71.src.model.data.Persistence
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Persistence extends Object implements Serializable
Handles the persistence layer of the photo album application, managing the saving and loading of user and album data to and from the disk.
Author:
Yash Puranik, Joseph Arrigo

  • Method Details

    • addFilepath

      public void addFilepath(String fpIn, Photo photoIn)
      Adds a filepath-Photo pair to filepathsUsed, a Map used to track all existing Photo objects by their filepath property.
      Parameters:
      fpIn - The filepath from a Photo object, converted toString().
      photoIn -

    • hasFilepath

      public Photo hasFilepath(String fpIn)
      Checks if there exists, in any Album owned by any User, a Photo object with the provided filepath.
      Parameters:
      fpIn - The filepath from a Photo object, converted toString().
      Returns:
      The photo object that is associated with the filepath, from the filepathsUsed map or null if there isn't one.

    • checkUser

      public boolean checkUser(String username)
      Checks if a user exists and sets them as the current user if they do.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      True if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String username)
      Retrieves a User object by username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The User object if the user exists, null otherwise.

    • setUsers

      public void setUsers(ArrayList<User> users)
      Sets the list of users managed by the admin.
      Parameters:
      users - The new list of users.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Retrieves the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The current user.

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser(User curr)
      Sets the currently logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      curr - The user to set as the current user.

    • save

      public static void save(Persistence pdApp)
      Saves the current state of the application to a file.
      Parameters:
      pdApp - The Persistence object containing the application's state.

    • load

      public static Persistence load()
      Loads the application's state from a file.
      Returns:
      The Persistence object representing the loaded application's state.
